title: Kwasi Kwarteng – 2022 Comments on Becoming Chancellor
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kwasi Kwarteng, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 7 September 2022.
content:
We face extraordinary economic challenges in the coming weeks and months and I know that families and businesses across the UK are worried.
